name: Escube Industries
overview:
Established in year 1980, we, “Escube Industries”, are one of the leading organizations engaged in manufacturing and supplying Transformer Oil Filtration Plant.

Products & Services : Transformer Oil Purification Plant S.S. Oil Sample Bottle Hot Oil System Oil Reclamation Plant Oil Transfer Pump Transformer Oil Storage Tank

Our Vision/; To be amongst the most admired and most trusted oil filtration solution providing company delivering reliable and quality equipment to all customers at competitive costs.

Our Team With an objective to stand ahead of our counterparts, we have appointed experienced and diligent professionals. All these professionals posses vast experience and knowledge, which they utilize while completing the assigned tasks.

Quality Policy: Backed by the profound experience of this domain, we ensure to offer superior quality products to the clients. These products are manufactured in accordance with industry laid guidelines and standards.

Why Us? With our in-depth knowledge and experience, today we are a successful manufacturer of gear and gear boxes. Our industrial image has helped us in winning the faith and trust of our clients.
